## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description | Type     | Default |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| `selectedIndex` | `selected-index` |             | `number` | `0`     |


## Events

| Event                  | Description | Type                  |
| ---------------------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `admiraltyTabSelected` |             | `CustomEvent<number>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                          | Description                                          |
| --------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-font-size`             | Font size for the tab group                          |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-font-weight`           | Font weight for the tab group                        |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-not-desktop-font-size` | Font size for the tab group when not in desktop view |
